a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Diarrheal diseases death rate by age, World, 1990 to 2019
Estimated annual deaths from diarrheal diseases per 100,000 people in the same age group. Also shown is the
total death rate across all combined ages and the age-standardized death rate.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
